title: About
content:
Welcome to Grapple Comps! We are a team of jiu-jitsu enthusiasts who are passionate about providing a platform for competitors to find local competitions and showcase their skills.

Our website was born out of the frustration we felt as competitors ourselves, struggling to find a simple and efficient directory of local competitions. We realized that there was a need for a centralized platform where competitors could easily search for an register for competitions without having to sift through multiple websites or social media channels.

We aim to provide a comprehensive database of jiu-jitsu competitions across different regions, so that competitors can easily find the right competition for them.

We believe that competitions not only serve as a way for competitors to test their skills, but also as a way to build comaraderie, sportsmanship, and a sense of community within the jiu-jitsu world. We hope that our website can play a small part in fostering this community spirit.
